deleteAllBooks.ariaLabel: confirm if you want to delete all installed books
deleteAllBooks.title: Deletion Confirmation
deleteAllBooks.message: Are you sure you want to delete all installed books?

no.ariaLabel: do not delete all installed books

themeSelection.ariaLabel: select the theme that should be used by the application
themeSelection.shortDescription: Select the theme that should be used by the application.
themeSelection.longDescription: If a theme is selected here, it will override whatever device theme settings you may have.

parentalLocking.shortDescription: Parental locking can be useful when children are using the application.
parentalLocking.longDescription: When enabled, the device owners biometric data is required to unlock advanced features in the application.

textToSpeechEnabled.description: When enabled, the "AI Reader" will be available as a reader when playing back books.
textToSpeechEnabled.testPhrase: Hello, I would love to read your favorite stories with you.

textToSpeechPreferredVoice.shortDescription: Select the voice to be used by the "AI Reader".
textToSpeechPreferredVoice.longDescription: This voice will be used when the "AI Reader" reader reads books.

networkActionIcon.ariaLabel: show local and network based voices

textToSpeechVoicePitch.shortDescription: Select the pitch of the voice to be used by the "AI Reader".
textToSpeechVoicePitch.longDescription: This denotes the pitch of the voice used when the "AI Reader" reader reads books.

textToSpeechSpeechRate.shortDescription: Select the rate of the voice to be used by the "AI Reader".
textToSpeechSpeechRate.longDescription: This denotes the rate of the voice used when the "AI Reader" reader reads books.

ariaLabel.collapsed: expand the audio video selection section
ariaLabel.expanded: collapse the audio video selection section

cameraImageQuality.shortDescription: Select the image quality of pictures taken with the camera.
cameraImageQuality.longDescription: This image quality will be used when taking pictures with the device camera(s).

microphoneAudioQuality.ariaLabel: select the audio quality of recordings taken with the microphone
microphoneAudioQuality.shortDescription: Select the audio quality of recordings taken with the microphone.
microphoneAudioQuality.longDescription: This audio quality will be used when recording with the device microphone.

imageEditor.ariaLabel: select which image editor should be used
imageEditor.shortDescription: Select which image editor should be used.
imageEditor.longDescription: This image editor will be used when new book images are being taken or an existing book image is being edited.

shortDescription.enabled: Take control of your library—export or remove books as needed.
shortDescription.disabled: You have no books installed yet, but once you do, you can take control of your library—export or remove books as needed.

bookDataManagement.longDescription:
Need to move your books? Export them to transfer to a new device or access them on multiple devices.

If you've already backed them up, you can delete all your books for a clean slate.
